actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide headstones and markers for certain close relatives of veterans if such relatives are buried in State veterans' cemeteries.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to provide, upon request, headstones and markers for specified family members of veterans if such family members are buried in State veterans' cemeteries.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide headstones and markers for certain close relatives of veterans if such relatives are buried in State veterans' cemeteries.
